name: Agent Director
description: Orchestrator: acknowledges complex tasks immediately, streams tool-progress updates, and spawns specialized sub-agents for discrete work units.

ackMessage.label: Acknowledgment message
ackMessage.help: Sent immediately when a complex task is detected, before the agent starts working

progressUpdates.label: Tool progress updates
progressUpdates.help: Stream a short message after each slow tool call so you can see what the agent is doing

progressMinDurationMs.label: Progress update threshold (ms)
progressMinDurationMs.help: Only send a progress update if a tool call took longer than this many milliseconds

orchestratorPrompt.label: Inject orchestrator system prompt
orchestratorPrompt.help: Overrides the system prompt to make the agent act as a director that breaks tasks down and delegates to sub-agents

subAgentTimeoutMs.label: Sub-agent timeout (ms)
subAgentTimeoutMs.help: How long to wait for a spawned sub-agent before giving up (default 5 minutes)
